name: RPG Test (lukeshorejones)
description:
RPG Test is a tactical RPG that you can customise. Play in single player or multiplayer with our premade content, or create your own maps, units, weapons and unit traits to personalise your experience - no coding required!

Most of the game's customisation is done by editing the files in the content folder. You can also edit settings.yml (in the main directory) to configure various settings, including the game's difficulty level (try hard mode for a fun challenge!).

If you're interested, the source code for this game is available at: https://github.com/lukeshorejones/rpg-test
